message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond your initial assessment.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500? This offer reflects the product's true value.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $11,800?
